DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT3 TNM Finding Involvement Level Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text statement to describe the extent of the pathologic spread of prostate cancer (pT3) to indicate the level of extraprostatic extension that is present on pathologic evaluation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT3 TNM Finding Involvement Level
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer with extraprostatic extension. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)_To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process._A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.  (NCI)

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer with extraprostatic extension. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pT3 TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer with extraprostatic extension. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

Property.preferredDefinition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.:A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.  (NCI)

Concepts.definition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.
A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per approval by B.McClure-Shimel. mc 1/18/12

ValueDomain.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT3 TNM Finding Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer with extraprostatic extension. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)_The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer extending beyond the capsule of the prostate gland, with involvement of the seminal vesicles. (from AJCC 6th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pT3b TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer with seminal vesicle invasion. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prostate Cancer pT3a TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT3a TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer with extraprostatic extension or microscopic invasion of bladder neck.  Positive surgical margin should be indicated by an R1 descriptor (residual microscopic disease). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pT3a TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer with extraprostatic extension or microscopic invasion of bladder neck.  Positive surgical margin should be indicated by an R1 descriptor (residual microscopic disease). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT3 TNM Finding Stage
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer with extraprostatic extension. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.):The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pT3 TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer with extraprostatic extension. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)
The extent of a cancer in the body.
